title: All Ball - New Kobe/Shaq Feud; Dwight Howard's L.A. Role; Boogie's Downfall; Guest:  BTN Analyst, Ex-Iowa Star Jess Settles
itunes:title: All Ball - New Kobe/Shaq Feud; Dwight Howard's L.A. Role; Boogie's Downfall; Guest:  BTN Analyst, Ex-Iowa Star Jess Settles
description:
This week, Gottlieb looks at the recent Kobe/Shaq media feud sparked by Kobe's comments about O'Neal's work ethic, what role Dwight Howard will fill with the Lakers, if Boogie Cousins is done in the NBA following his most recent legal problems. Guest: Former Iowa star, and Iowa Mr. Basketball Jess Settles discusses growing up in rural Iowa, fulfilling his dream of playing for the Hawkeyes, and trades hoop stories. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
